verses.text: \w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

Whosoever \w shall|strong="H0175"\w* sin, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* despising \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord, \w shall|strong="H0175"\w* deny \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* neighbour \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w thing|strong="H2063"\w* \w delivered|strong="H6680"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* keeping, \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w committed|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* trust; \w or|strong="H5704"\w* \w shall|strong="H0175"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* force extort \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w thing|strong="H2063"\w*, \w or|strong="H5704"\w* \w commit|strong="H6680"\w* oppression;

\w Or|strong="H0398"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* find \w a|strong="H7760"\w* thing lost, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* denying \w it|strong="H7760"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w also|strong="H0853"\w* swear falsely, \w or|strong="H0398"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* do \w any|strong="H0398"\w* other \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* many \w things|strong="H0834"\w*, \w wherein|strong="H0834"\w* \w men|strong="H1320"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* wont \w to|strong="H5921"\w* sin:
Being convicted \w of|strong="H4264"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* offence, \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w shall|strong="H2889"\w* restore

All \w that|strong="H2459"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w would|strong="H3548"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* gotten \w by|strong="H5921"\w* fraud, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* principal, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* fifth \w part|strong="H5921"\w* \w besides|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* owner, whom \w he|strong="H3808"\w* wronged.

Moreover \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* sin \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* offer \w a|strong="H5921"\w* ram \w without|strong="H3808"\w* blemish \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* flock, \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* give \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* priest, \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* estimation \w and|strong="H4196"\w* measure \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* offence:

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H0175"\w* pray \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H0175"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* forgiveness \w for|strong="H0413"\w* every \w thing|strong="H2063"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* doing \w of|strong="H1121"\w* which \w he|strong="H3068"\w* hath sinned.
\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* spoke \w to|strong="H5921"\w* Moses, saying:

Command \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H4480"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*: \w This|strong="H0398"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* law \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H4480"\w* holocaust: \w It|strong="H0398"\w* \w shall|strong="H0175"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* burnt upon \w the|strong="H4480"\w* altar, \w all|strong="H0398"\w* night until morning: \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w fire|strong="H0398"\w* \w shall|strong="H0175"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w same|strong="H4480"\w* altar.

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* priest \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* vested \w with|strong="H0644"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* tunick \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* linen breeches, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H5414"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* ashes \w of|strong="H6944"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* devouring \w fire|strong="H0801"\w* hath burnt, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w putting|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* beside \w the|strong="H0853"\w* altar,

\w Shall|strong="H0175"\w* put \w off|strong="H0398"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* former vestments, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w being|strong="H1121"\w* clothed \w with|strong="H3068"\w* others, \w shall|strong="H0175"\w* carry \w them|strong="H0398"\w* forth without \w the|strong="H3605"\w* camp, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H0175"\w* cause \w them|strong="H0398"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w consumed|strong="H0398"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* dust \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* very clean \w place|strong="H3605"\w*,

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* fire \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* altar \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* always burn, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* priest \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* feed \w it|strong="H1696"\w*, putting wood \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w it|strong="H1696"\w* every \w day|strong="H4872"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* morning, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* laying \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* holocaust, \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* burn thereupon \w the|strong="H0559"\w* fat \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* peace \w offerings|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w perpetual|strong="H8548"\w* fire \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0175"\w* never \w go|strong="H7126"\w* \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* altar.

\w This|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* law \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H4503"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* libations, which \w the|strong="H5921"\w* children \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Aaron \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* altar.

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* take \w a|strong="H3068"\w* handful \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* flour \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* tempered \w with|strong="H3068"\w* oil, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3632"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* frankincense \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* put upon \w the|strong="H0853"\w* flour: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* altar \w for|strong="H8478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* memorial \w of|strong="H1121"\w* most sweet odour \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*:

\w And|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* part \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* flour \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w left|strong="H1961"\w*, Aaron \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* sons \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*, \w without|strong="H3808"\w* leaven: \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w it|strong="H0398"\w* \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* holy \w place|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* court \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* tabernacle.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w therefore|strong="H4872"\w* \w it|strong="H1696"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* not \w be|strong="H3068"\w* leavened, \w because|strong="H0413"\w* part thereof \w is|strong="H3068"\w* offered \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* burnt sacrifice \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*. \w It|strong="H1696"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* most holy, \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* which \w is|strong="H3068"\w* offered \w for|strong="H0413"\w* sin \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H0413"\w* trespass.

\w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w males|strong="H1121"\w* only \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w race|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w shall|strong="H0175"\w* eat \w it|strong="H1931"\w*. \w It|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H0175"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w an|strong="H6440"\w* ordinance everlasting \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* generations \w concerning|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H6944"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: Every \w one|strong="H1931"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* toucheth \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w shall|strong="H0175"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* sanctified.
\w And|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord spoke \w to|strong="H4725"\w* Moses, saying:

\w This|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* oblation \w of|strong="H5921"\w* Aaron, \w and|strong="H1818"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* sons, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w must|strong="H1818"\w* offer \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* day \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* anointing: \w They|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* offer \w the|strong="H3605"\w* tenth \w part|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w an|strong="H5921"\w* ephi \w of|strong="H5921"\w* flour \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* perpetual sacrifice, half \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* morning, \w and|strong="H1818"\w* half \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* evening:

\w It|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w be|strong="H4325"\w* tempered \w with|strong="H3627"\w* oil, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w be|strong="H4325"\w* fried \w in|strong="H7665"\w* \w a|strong="H0518"\w* fryingpan.

\w And|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* rightfully succeedeth \w his|strong="H3605"\w* father, \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* offer \w it|strong="H1931"\w* hot, \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H0398"\w* \w most|strong="H6944"\w* sweet odour \w to|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H3605"\w* \w wholly|strong="H3605"\w* burnt \w on|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* altar.

\w For|strong="H0413"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* sacrifice \w of|strong="H0168"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* priest \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w consumed|strong="H0398"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* thereof.
And the Lord spoke to Moses, saying:
Say to Aaron and his sons: This is the law of the victim for sin: in the place where the holocaust is offered, it shall be immolated before the Lord. It is holy of holies.
The priest that offereth it, shall eat it in a holy place, in the court of the tabernacle.
Whatsoever shall touch the flesh thereof, shall be sanctified. If a garment be sprinkled with the blood thereof, it shall be washed in a holy place.
And the earthen vessel, wherein it was sodden, shall be broken, but if the vessel be of brass, it shall be scoured, and washed with water.
Every male of the priestly race shall eat of the flesh thereof, because it is holy of holies.
For the victim that is slain for sin, the blood of which is carried into the tabernacle of the testimony to make atonement in the sanctuary, shall not be eaten, but shall be burnt with fire.
